mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_PROD_NO.NEXTVAL,#{prodName},#{prodDetail},#{manuDate},#{price},#{fileName},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no as prod_no, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_detail as prod_detail, p.manufacture_day as manufacture_day, p.price as price, p.image_file as image_file, p.reg_date as reg_date, (SELECT t.tran_no FROM transaction t WHERE t.prod_no=p.prod_no and t.tran_status_code !='999') as tran_no, (SELECT t.tran_status_code FROM transaction t WHERE t.prod_no=p.prod_no and t.tran_status_code !='999') as tran_status_code FROM product p WHERE p.prod_no = #{value}
